title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 300-2.1 - Designated agency official
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 300-2.1 - Designated agency official

State Regulations

Each tenant agency shall provide the commissioner with
the name, address and telephone numbers of at least three authorized
representatives to be notified in the event of an emergency and shall ensure
that such information is up to date at all times. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
300-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
